instructions: Preheat oven to 220 degrees C (425 degrees F). Combine Becel(R) Buttery Taste margarine and all ingredients in 1-1/2-quart baking dish. Season, if desired, with salt. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake an additional 15 minutes or until squash is tender.
ingredients: 1/4 cup Becel® Buttery Taste margarine, melted
1 (1- 3/4) pound butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
title: Becel® Holiday Butternut Squash with Apple and Cranberries
